name: Protect The Wizzard Town
description:
Build and defend the city from an attack of magical creatures! Survive waves of enemies to gather resources to build new structures and select special upgrades.

In this game, you are tasked with the mission of defending a town of wizzards from upcoming waves of magical creatures that grow in power. For each creature destroyed, you gain resources that can be used to build up to 4 different types of buildings.

For every wave survived you can select an upgrade that makes your towers stronger. There are over 20 types basic of upgrades, and over 5 special ones, Each tower can have only 1 special upgrade per run. 

Feedback, bugs and suggestions can be reported via email.

Thank you!
